body:
In GitLab by @derrix060 on Jun 21, 2018, 05:29

changed title from **Checking 0 files {-c-}ould return an error.** to **Checking 0 files {+sh+}ould return an error.**

In GitLab by @derrix060 on Jun 21, 2018, 05:29

changed the description

In GitLab by @asottile on Jun 26, 2018, 09:12

This is your _shell_ giving a nonzero exit code.  flake8 never runs.

For instance, try it in bash:

```
$ flake8 wat/*.py
$ echo $?
0
```

```
z$ flake8 wat/*.py
zsh: no matches found: wat/*.py
z$ echo $?
1
```

In GitLab by @asottile on Jun 29, 2018, 18:09

Also note that you can enable the zsh behaviour in bash:

```
$ shopt -s failglob
$ flake8 *.wat
bash: no match: *.wat
```

In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Oct 20, 2018, 10:02

closed

issue.title: Add an example plugin project to source tree - [merged]

repository.name: flake8
repository.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

issue.body:
In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Oct 25, 2016, 16:22

_Merges example-project -> master_

Necessary to start investigating issue #239

issue.title: Actually remove enabled extensions from ignore list - [merged]

repository.name: flake8
repository.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

issue.body:
In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Nov 9, 2016, 16:48

_Merges bug/239 -> master_

When we enable a plugin (when it's provided in the --enable-extensions)
plugin, we need to remove it both from the extended default ignore list
and the plain ignore list.

Closes #239 

cc @warsaw

issue.title: Fix subtle reporting bug for default on plugins - [merged]

repository.name: flake8
repository.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

issue.body:
In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Nov 15, 2016, 17:52

_Merges bug/257 -> master_

When we refactored our decision process to fix #239, we broke a subtle
corner case where extensions that are not off-by-default are to be
reported.

This further refactors that logic and adds specific tests around it to
ensure it works as expected and doesn't regress.

Closes #257

issue.title: Handle a previously unhandled code scenario - [merged]

repository.name: flake8
repository.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

issue.body:
In GitLab by @sigmavirus24 on Nov 2, 2016, 08:25

_Merges bug/242 -> master_

Previously, we didn't handle the case where an error code was implicitly
ignored (by not being in --select) and implicitly selected (by not being
in --ignore). This means we need to update StyleGuide#_decision_for and
StyleGuide#is_user_selected to handle these cases.

Closes #242

Related-to #239

Related-to !132
